LanguageData.VME_Expectations_High.label: high
LanguageData.VME_Expectations_High.description:
Our people are creatures of comfort, even the commoners among us deserve to relax or be pampered from time to time.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Expectations increased by 1 for everyone in the colony.
LanguageData.VME_Expectations_Low.label: low
LanguageData.VME_Expectations_Low.description:
The Rim is an inhospitable place. We shouldn't expect a comfy live.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Expectations lowered by 1 for everyone in the colony.
